languages.text: {n}Техножрец осторожно прикасается мехадендритами к иссохшему телу служителя. Из клешней выдвигаются инфошипы, погружающиеся в аугментации сервитора. Вокс Паскаля звучит задумчиво и слегка озадаченно:{/n} "Идентифицирую данную единицу как Магоса Логиса Гектодона-XI. Единица была семикратно отмечена за успехи в области астрографии, занесенными в архив флота. Единица... он любил наблюдать за звездами. Называл их маяками, оставленными нам Омниссией".

{n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец осторожно прикасается мехадендритами к иссохшему телу служителя. Из клешней выдвигаются инфошипы, погружающиеся в аугментации сервитора. Вокс Паскаля звучит задумчиво и слегка озадаченно:{/n} "Идентифицирую данную единицу как Магоса Логиса Гектодона-XI. Единица была семикратно отмечена за успехи в области астрографии, занесенными в архив флота. Единица... он любил наблюдать за звездами. Называл их маяками, оставленными нам Омниссией".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Dataspikes slide out of their claws and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and a little puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography, recorded in the Fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons the Omnissiah left for us."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はサーヴィターの干からびた身体に機械触手で慎重に触れる。データスパイクが機械触手を逃れてサーヴィターのオーグメティックに沈んでいく。パスカルのヴォクスが、考え込むような、わずかに困惑した音を発する。{/n}「このユニットをマゴス論理学者、ヘクトドン・XIと認識。当該ユニットは艦隊アーカイブに記録されている天文撮影術の向上を理由に7度、表彰されています。当該ユニットは…星を眺めることを好んだ。星々を、万機神が我らに残した灯台と称していたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭はサーヴィターの干からびた身体に機械触手で慎重に触れる。データスパイクが機械触手を逃れてサーヴィターのオーグメティックに沈んでいく。パスカルのヴォクスが、考え込むような、わずかに困惑した音を発する。{/n}「このユニットをマゴス論理学者、ヘクトドン・XIと認識。当該ユニットは艦隊アーカイブに記録されている天文撮影術の向上を理由に7度、表彰されています。当該ユニットは…星を眺めることを好んだ。星々を、万機神が我らに残した灯台と称していたのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡小心翼翼地用机械触须摸着机仆枯萎的身体。数据指针从触须中滑出，插入机仆的植入物中。帕斯卡的声音听起来若有所思，又有些困惑。{/n}“识别该单位为逻辑士贤者赫克托顿十一号。舰队档案记录显示，该单位曾因在天文学上的进步而获得七次嘉奖。该单位……他喜欢看星星，他称群星为‘欧姆尼塞亚留给我们的灯塔’。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡小心翼翼地用机械触须摸着奴工枯萎的身体。数据指针从触须中滑出，插入奴工的植入物中。帕斯卡的声音听起来若有所思，又有些困惑。{/n}“识别该单位为逻辑士贤者赫克托顿十一号。舰队档案记录显示，该单位曾因在天文学上的进步而获得七次嘉奖。该单位……他喜欢看星星，他称群星为‘欧姆尼塞亚留给我们的灯塔’。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}À l'aide de ses mécadendrites, le technoprêtre charge des données directement dans les augmétiques du servitor.{/n} « Identification de l'unité : magos Logis Hectodon-XI, » {n}finit-il par énoncer d'un air perplexe.{/n} « D'après les archives de la Flotte, cette unité s'est vue décerner sept décorations pour sa contribution à l'astrographie. Cette unité... aimait observer les étoiles. Il les considérait comme des signes envoyés par l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'aide de ses mécadendrites, le technoprêtre charge des données directement dans les augmétiques du servitor.{/n} « Identification de l'unité : magos Logis Hectodon-XI, » {n}finit-il par énoncer d'un air perplexe.{/n} « D'après les archives de la Flotte, cette unité s'est vue décerner sept décorations pour sa contribution à l'astrographie. Cette unité... aimait observer les étoiles. Il les considérait comme des signes envoyés par l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote toca el cuerpo marchito del servidor con sus mecadendritas. De ellas surgen unos pinchos de datos y se hunden en los auméticos del servidor. La voz de Pasqal suena pensativa y algo confundida.{/n} «Identifico a esta unidad como el magos logos Hectodon-XI. La unidad recibió siete reconocimientos por avances en astrografía registrados en el archivo de la flota. A este servidor... le gustaba observar las estrellas. Creía que eran faros que nos había dejado el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote toca el cuerpo marchito del servidor con sus mecadendritas. De ellas surgen unos pinchos de datos y se hunden en los auméticos del servidor. La voz de Pasqal suena pensativa y algo confundida.{/n} «Identifico a esta unidad como el magos logos Hectodon-XI. La unidad recibió siete reconocimientos por avances en astrografía registrados en el archivo de la flota. A este servidor... le gustaba observar las estrellas. Creía que eran faros que nos había dejado el Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester berührt mit seinen Mechadendriten vorsichtig den verkümmerten Körper des Servitors. Datenstacheln gleiten aus den Mechadendriten und versenken sich in den Augmentationen des Servitors. Pasqals Vox ertönt — nachdenklich und leicht verwirrt.{/n} "Ich identifiziere diese Einheit als Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. Die Einheit hat laut Flottenarchiv sieben Belobigungen für Fortschritte in der Astrografie erhalten. Die Einheit ... er hat gerne in die Sterne geblickt. Er nannte sie Leuchtfeuer, die der Omnissiah uns hinterlassen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester berührt mit seinen Mechadendriten vorsichtig den verkümmerten Körper des Servitors. Datenstacheln gleiten aus den Mechadendriten und versenken sich in den Augmentationen des Servitors. Pasqals Vox ertönt — nachdenklich und leicht verwirrt.{/n} "Ich identifiziere diese Einheit als Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. Die Einheit hat laut Flottenarchiv sieben Belobigungen für Fortschritte in der Astrografie erhalten. Die Einheit ... er hat gerne in die Sterne geblickt. Er nannte sie Leuchtfeuer, die der Omnissiah uns hinterlassen hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, hizmetörün solgun bedenine mekadentritleriyle dikkatle dokunuyor. İçlerinden veri depoları çıkıp hizmetörün ogmetiklerine giriyor. Pasqal'ın voksundan hem düşünceli hem de biraz şaşkın bir ses çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu birimin kimliğinin Magos Logis Hectodon-XI olduğunu saptadım. Birim, filo arşivine kayıtlı astrografya atılımlarında yedi kez takdir elde etmiş. Bu birim... Yıldızları izlemekten hoşlanıyormuş. Onlara Hermesih'in bize bıraktığı, yol gösterici fenerler gözüyle bakıyormuş."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest carefully touches the servitor's withered body with his mechadendrites. Data-spikes slide out of them and sink into the servitor's augmetics. Pasqal's vox sounds thoughtful and slightly puzzled.{/n} "I identify this unit as Magos Logis Hectodon-XI. The unit received seven commendations for advances in astrography recorded in the fleet archive. The unit... he liked watching the stars. He called them beacons left for us by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip mekadentritleriyle hizmetörün solgun bedenine dikkatle dokunuyor. İçlerinden veri depoları çıkıyor ve hizmetörün ogmetiklerinin içine giriyor. Pasqal'ın voksundan çıkan ses düşünceli ve biraz da şaşkın:{/n} "Bu birimin kimliğinin Magos Logis Hectodon-XI olduğunu saptadım. Birim, filo arşivine kayıtlı astrografya atılımlarında yedi kez takdir elde etmiş. Bu birim... Yıldızları izlemekten hoşlanıyormuş. Onlara Hermesih'in bize bıraktığı, yol gösterici fenerler gözüyle bakıyormuş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
